result.name: Clinical and genomic features of Chinese lung cancer patients with germline mutations
result.description: This cohort included NGS data of a panel on 1021 cancer related gene from paired cancer-normal samples of 1794 Chinese lung cancer patients, including 44 SCLC patients and 1750 non-small cell lung cancer patients. According to ACMG 2015 guideline, pathogenic germline mutations were annotated and manually verified.
result.center: Hunan Cancer Hospital, Changsha, P.R. China
